main event: On 12 April 1955, an observer reported seeing an unidentified aerial object over San Francisco, California.
interesting points: The object was described as round and metallic in appearance,The object was approximately 30 to 40 feet in diameter,It made three passes before disappearing towards the Oakland Bay Bridge,The sighting occurred at 2138 hours, The case was investigated by Capt. R. Snider on 18 April 1955.
